text:
There were no gowns, visors, swabs or body bags in the government's pandemic stockpile when Covid-19 reached the UK, BBC Panorama has uncovered.

The government said it has taken the right steps and is doing everything it can to increase stocks.

https://t.co/jxqrfQLyGh
